root.name: Neighbors from Hell 2: On Vacation
root.description: GameplayThe gameplay is similar to the original game in which you set up traps for your neighbor to stumble upon. The main difference with the sequel is the varying locations; for example: the ship, the beach, etc.A couple of new tools, and location-specific traps are also introduced.CharactersWoody- The main protagonist. You play as this character.Mr. Rottweiler- The character that you pester throughout the game.Mom- Mr. Rottweiler's mother.Olga- Mr. Rottweiler's love interest.Olga's child- The son of Olga. Is constantly picked on by Mr. Rottweiler.Mom's dog- The pet of Mr. Rottweiler's mother.
